name: Icon
description: Theme-driven icon size/color helpers and WrappedIcon.

use: you want consistent icon sizing and colors from the theme.
you need fluent icon modifiers (small, large, muted, etc.).

constructors: `WrappedIcon` — wraps an icon theme around a child.

theming: Icon sizes and colors resolve from `ThemeData.iconTheme` and `ThemeData.colorScheme`.
accessibility: Keep icon sizes large enough for touch targets when interactive.
do: Use the icon helpers to keep sizes consistent.
dont: Mix arbitrary icon sizes within the same control group.
